file_content.text: This is for you, Garthe. I saw you ahead of me there, before the pack cut us off.
I just want to tell you--you're wrong. The dead do care what happens to them after they die.
I'm one of them now. I hear those monsters, sniffing for me in the dark, and I know I'll be with the dead before anyone comes for us.
But I'd rather lie here a thousand years, undiscovered, than have some greedy son of a Hutt like you dig me up just to see what I've got that's worth stealing.
I hope someone else finds this and makes you pay for your crimes. Like I'm about to pay for mine.
